# Albergo diffuso Santo Stefano di Sessanio - Ref: SXT

##  A country road winds its way up through beautiful hillside landscapes and
leads you to the fortified village of Santo Stefano di Sessanio. Located in
the moutains of Abruzzo at 1250m above sea level, inside the Gran Sasso and
Monti delle Laga national park, this medieval town is a classic example of an
Italian medieval hill town with perimeter walls encircling houses and squares.  
The "Albergo diffuso" is a culturally historical project which breathes life
into the forgotten places and people of Abruzzo while preserving the historic
character of the buildings and retaining its soul. Over 10 years of study and
research have been necessary to bring back to life the customs of the
inhabitants, their culinary habits, their crafts and to recreate a true life
experience of living there hundreds years ago. The result is of unmatched
beauty, an unforgettable experience for the traveler.  
This boutique hotel is unique in its kind with 28 rooms spread over different
houses of the town restored with the utmost care using materials salvaged from
this century-old place, from the ground to furniture and textiles, authentic
items from the Abruzzo Mountains. Antique furniture, traditional handcrafts
perfectly combined with design elements are reflected in the decoration of
each room: natural colours, woolen mattresses, dim light, handmade bedspreads
woven on traditional looms.  
The spacious and comfortable rooms are equipped with private bathroom (bath or
shower), quality bedding, fire place, hairdryer, underfloor heating.
Traditional liquors and mineral water are complimentary. This boutique hotel
offers you an intimate and exclusive stay to experience the traditions and
spirit of ancient rural life without renouncing to comfort and high quality
standards. Each room shares a living/dining room with other rooms of the
building.  
A delicious buffet breakfast is served in the dining room of one of the houses
in the village. Fresh products and local producers are a must. An address to
discover all year round offering an original and high quality alternative to
staying in a traditional hotel.  
The hotel enjoys a perfect location to discover the national park of Gran
sasso, its historic, cultural and archeological heritage, its biodiversity and
unspoiled nature, its handcrafts and enogastronomic traditions. Many
activities are organised on site. With a noble and well defined heritage, the
village of Santo Stefano offers a pleasant atmosphere and spectacular views on
the contrasting landscapes of Gran Sasso.

###  Key facts

Absolute peace • Comfort • Regional cuisine • Unique concept • All year round
activities • Panoramic views over the mountains and valleys •

## Hote-Italia is an agency specializing in central and southern Italy.

### For over 10 years we've been traveling in Italy to find unique and
charming lodgings, meet their owners, enjoy a great hospitality and visit each
region to propose you the best itineraries. Our customers are sure to come
back not only with a memorable souvenir but also with and an enriching
cultural experience.

### LOCATION

###  VISITS

Hiking or skiing in the Gran Sasso National Park • 9km Rocca Calascio fortress
• 26km Cistercian abbey of S.Felice d´Ocre • 26km Abbey of Bominaco • 28km
l´Aquila • the medieval boroughs of the land of the barons •

### Restaurant

Authentic and rustic

The restaurant located in one of the houses in the village is dominated by two
large stone arches and a central fireplace. The interior is primitive, minimal
with antique dark wooden, furniture. All fodd is based on what should have
been available and eaten back then. Native, locally grown crops are used to
recreate original recipes from Abruzzo.
